company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ• បោសសម្អាត រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុ កៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យតាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ• បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ• បញ្ចូលកាតាឡុកសៀវភៅ• អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ• គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ• ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ខ្ចី-សងសៀវភៅ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា កត់ត្រាកំណត់ហេតុអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំខែ• បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ)• ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• រាប់ស្តុកសៀវភៅ• ចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការអគារប្រចាំខែ• ចងក្រងប្រវត្តិសកម្មភាពដែលមានក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន (ចំពោះតាមសាខាប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល)• ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បង្កើតសកម្មភាពជម្រុញអំណាន និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីបណ្ណាល័យ (យ៉ាងតិច៤សកម្មភាពក្នុង១ឆ្នាំ)• រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យទៅតាមព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សកម្មភាពបណ្ណាល័យ និងបុណ្យប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម• ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ និងចុះបញ្ជីសៀវភៅចូល• ជួយការងារផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើសុំជាក់ស្តែង• ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ (សម្រាប់តែបណ្ណាល័យ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង)
Job Requirement: • ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ• ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
•	Handling the marketing and sales operations for achieving increased growth & profitability.
•	Identifying new streams for revenue growth & developing plans. Using sales forecasting to ensure the sale as well as profitability of services; analyzing business developments & monitoring market trends
•	Identifying prospective clients, generating business from new accounts & developing them to achieve consistent profitability. 
•	Initiating contact with potential customers for developing leads, sales & building and maintaining healthy business relations with major clientele, ensuring maximum customer satisfaction by achieving performance parameters delivery & quality norms. 
•	Maintaining cordial relations with customers to sustain the profitability of the business.
•	Setting up service level timelines and measuring performance against them and maximizing customer satisfaction level by on time delivery, monitoring customer complaints, providing efficient services. 
•	Imparting /organizing training programs for achieving pre planned business targets.
•	Leading, training & monitoring the performance of team members to ensure efficiency in sales operations and meeting of individual & group target
•	Setting sale and profitability targets for individual fleets and your team as a whole
•	Monitoring your fleets sale/service performance and demand.
•	Continuously looking for area for implementation to achieve higher efficiency and Effectiveness of sale/services and operations.
•	Weekly update and analyze total market situation / customer feedback.
•	Deal with some major customer account yourself and handle complains.
•	Maintains contact with all clients in the market area to ensure high levels of client Satisfaction.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in management of business administration is plus
•	Strong achiever in a target-driven role.
•	Entrepreneurial Mind-set.
•	5 Year & above experience in Business development work in Cambodia
•	In-depth knowledge of Sales & Marketing techniques and best practices.
•	Capacity to manage various projects and work to tight deadlines.
•	Excellent negotiation and leadership skills.
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency 
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure.
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities

Contact: 
HR Department 
Contact Person: HORN Chamroeurn
Tel		: 077 3333 21/086 3333 02
Address	: #168, Street 107BT, Phum Chamroeun Phal, Sangkat Beong Tumpun, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh
Company Profile: SV Trucking is a well-establish road freight transport located its office in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. The business transports variety of general cargo and goods, as well as offers a dedicated overnight road freight service across Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  Telegram: 086 3333 02/077 3333 21  recruitmentsvtrucking@gmail.com  #168, Street 107BT, Phum Chamroeun Phal, Sangkat Beong Tumpun, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh Telegram: 086 3333 02/077 3333 21

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Keep under review all corporate governance arrangements or developments which might impact the Company to ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trust are fully briefed on these matters and has regard to them when taking decisions.• Provide specialized advice and guidance to Executive and Non-Executive and Managements on all matters of governance, legality, risk, compliance and business conduct and will manage and reconcile conflicting views in relation to governance issues.• Ensure that the Executive and Non-Executive remains compliant with applicable standards of corporate governance and has the necessary infrastructure to support the governance rationale and governance framework.• Ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, Board’s and each of Trustees and each of their committees conduct their business in compliance with applicable legal and regulatory frameworks and associated codes of governance and practice, and in a manner which is otherwise appropriate for a public body.• Take corporate responsibility for the formulation and implementation of a framework for the development and management of legal and compliance procedural documents (policies, procedures, protocols and guidance) and to ensure its implementation.• Address any non-compliance with the applicable Codes of Conduct and Accountability.• Monitor the suitability and efficacy of risk management provisions and advise on improvements in support of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees ability to make quarterly (or monthly) and annual statements and returns to the Regulator.• Ensure good information flows within the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees and its committees and between senior management, non-executive directors and managements. • Ensure that the requisite types of governance information are made available, either on the company’s website or in documents circulated to stakeholders;• Ensure the preparation, publication, distribution and presentation of the annual report;• Make available, where appropriate, for public inspection:  o A copy of the current constitution, registrations  o A copy of the latest annual accounts and any report of the auditor on those accounts  o A copy of the latest annual report• Ensure that all returns and self-certifications required by monitor, the Independent Regulator, are submitted in full and on time.• Ensure that the company complies with its constitution and that amendments to it are drafted and incorporated in line with correct procedures;• Attend Executive Management Team meetings to ensure congruence between the business of the Executive Management Team.• Bring to the attention of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees any areas of unmanaged risk, or unique risks that are not otherwise addressed;• Ensure that appropriate arrangements are made for the planning and production of agendas, reports and the subsequent minutes for meetings of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Boar of Trustees. • Contribute to a range of corporate projects relating to business proposals and developments.Legal Service• Provide a comprehensive Legal Service to deal with legal issues including inquests, employment law, litigation, commercial and contract law, and other judicial processes such as the management of claims arising from clinical negligence, complaints, disciplinary procedures and where relevant, untoward incidents reports and external enquiries;• Manage in-house staff and external legal service contract and associated budgets.• Ensure that appropriate procedures and protocols in place for the management of requests for legal advice and instructions on behalf of the Company;• Establish and communicate procedures for Management to take legal advice if required;
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree in Law, private law, and corporate law.• 5 years management experience.• Strong knowledge in commercial and business laws, civil code, civil procedure,legal statutes and legislations on construction, development, and land laws.• Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage).• Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel…• Hand-on legal practitioner.• Relational and People-centered.• Attention to Detail and Focus.• Trustworthy and Professional.• Committed and Loyal.• Highest level of Character and Integrity.• Strong leadership and management skills.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Provide inspiring and purposeful leadership for the staff, teachers and students.- Work in partnership with the Aii, staff and parents generating the beliefs and values that will underpin the school.- Continue to implement a Development Plan that will secure continuous school improvement.- Monitor and evaluate the performance of the school and respond and report to the management as required.- Ensure that management, finances, organization and administration of the school supports its vision and aims.- Ensure that school policies and practices take account of national, local and school requirements.- Monitor, evaluate and review the impact of policies, priorities and targets of the school in practice, and take action if necessary.- Ensure that all those involved in the school are committed to its aims, motivated to achieve them, and involved in meeting long, medium and short term objectives and targets which secure the educational success of the school.- Secure delivery of the highest possible standards of teaching and learning throughout the school.- Develop and maintain a focus on achievement, maximizing the potential and academic performance of all students against national and individual targets and aspirations.- Maintain effective assessment, recording and reporting systems of student progress and ensure these are used to challenge underperformance and drive improvement.- Build and maintain effective partnerships between school, students and parents to support learning.- Involve students, as appropriate, in the decision-making processes in the school by developing policies and practice that treat students as partners in the learning process.- Monitor, evaluate and review classroom practice and promote improvement strategies leading to raised standards.- Develop and implement a broad and relevant curriculum, which embraces the school’s specialisms, innovative approaches to teaching and learning, national initiatives and is at the forefront of best practice, to meet the needs of all students.- Ensure that educational provision and achievement for pupils with special needs are maximized through an appropriate mix of integrated and specialist needs provision.- Monitor and evaluate the curriculum for both quality and value for money.- Ensure that suitably challenging targets are set, including those for student attainment, progress, behavior and attendance.- Develop an ethos and structure for managing behavior, which enables each student to achieve their potential, including the management of pastoral care, student welfare and effective anti-bullying procedures.- Be outward facing, taking a strategic role in the development of new and emerging technologies to enhance and extend the learning experience of students and the pedagogical skills of staff, deploying technological resources effectively and efficiently in order to realize the aims of the school.- Create a culture of challenge, high expectations and support where all students can achieve success and be engaged in personalized learning, supported by a curriculum offer appropriate to their individual needs, aspirations and abilities.- Ensure a wide range of community-based, off-site and outdoor learning experiences are available.- To promote extracurricular activities in accordance with the educational aims of the school.- Supervise ESL Teachers and other staff.- Plan, allocate, support and evaluate work undertaken by groups, teams and individuals, ensuring clear delegation of tasks and devolution of responsibilities in a manner consistent with conditions of employment.- Implement and sustain effective systems for the management of staff performance, incorporating performance management and target setting.- Promote and monitor the continuing professional development of staff, conduct a workshop or sharing sessions to the teachers under supervision.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor/Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - Administration and control of Intercon Bookstore operation including customer service- Direct Intercon Bookstore staffs in the performance of all day-to-day operation by provide all staff with daily task list- Designing strategies to response the company strategy plan- Review daily sale and Sale return report - Review monthly Sale and Sale return report- Ensure accurate and timely stock counts, carried out according to the operation procedure- Monthly stock count- monthly stock count report for all campuses- Prepare and review monthly work action plan for all staff- Check and review on staff tardiness and performance- Solved issued with other departments- Perform assigned responsibilities, duties, and other tasks according to established practices procedures and standards in a safe and efficient manner- Perform other related duties as requested- Ensure daily operational of all IB stores run smoothly both internal and external- Ensure CSR is properly monitor- Control all IB revenue, Discount, Sale return- Improve customer services- Create and update procedure for operations- Coordinate with staffs and other departments- Monitor and control stock managements of all IB store- Staff managements- Create good environment for teamwork- Randomly spot check and do round- Cash float control of all stores- Review on pricing- Create operation flow and training before implement (new product, services, promotion etc)- Make sure information has been proper sharing to all relevant staffs- Make clear instruction, Tasks, deadline to staffs- Direct Intercon Bookstore staff in the performance of all day-to-day operation by provide all staff with daily task list- Check and review daily sale and sale return report- Check and review monthly sale and sale return report- Conduct monthly stock count- Prepare administrative and operational reports as requires- Solve issue with other departments- Perform other related duties required by line manager.
Job Requirement: KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:- At least 3+ years’ working experience project management.- Result and customer-service oriented.- Committed and responsible team player.- Excellent interpersonal skills essential.- Good organizational skills and ability to work well with other department.- Must have knowledge of retail operating principles, cashiering, budgeting, management principle, inventory and accounting.- Ability to work with a diverse group of people and have strong multi-tasking skills, excellent oral communication skills and the ability to perform consistently, even under pressure.- Ability to supervise and train employees, to include organizing, prioritizing, and scheduling work assignments.- Employee development and performance management skills.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Support on all recruitment activities of the assigned campuses.- Support some functions in the part of compensation and benefits as required from Central Office.- Collecting data and generate into analytical report and propose recommendation and solutions based on the report.- Assist in overviewing the organizational structure of each business unit and department as well as to clarify on the manpower planning to Head of department if needed.- Deal with organizational, people, and change-related issues.- Reinforce on implementation on HR Policies and Procedures for the entire company.- Overview on the human resources risks and inform to higher management for pro-active action.- Conduct quarterly audit to the assigned campuses.- Assist HR Business Partner Manager to work with business operators to ensure the company’s workforce of the assigned campuses has the right size, shape, HR cost and agility for the future.- Resolve daily HR issues with line managers and department heads at the assigned campuses.- Coordinate in KPI Setting for staff and performance evaluation process located at the assigned campuses.- Provide guidance to related departments and employees on HR processes and HR policies located at the assigned campuses.- Assist in staff disciplinary actions located at the assigned campuses.- Work with Department Head and compensation and benefit team to retain talents in the Company through initiation rewarding and recognition programs.- Coordinate in employee relations programs such as team building activities, staff parties, and other social activities to increase the favourable working culture in the Company. - Work with management and employees to solve conflicts and help facilitate positive employee relations, maintain a good working environment, build morale, and decrease unwanted turnover.- Work on talent development by identify employees’ training needs and work closely with training and CSR department to implement Training Programs as needed.  - Work closely with other HR Teams to manage all aspects of HR Service to support assigned business division.- Generate monthly reports for President, Head Principal and Campus Director and HR at the Central Office as required. - Coordinate and implement succession planning policy located at the assigned campuses.- Conduct employee engagement survey and general report and to discuss with higher management for HR re-strategy.- Deal with labour inspector and Immigration Officer if required.- Other tasks assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement: - A minimum of 3 years of human resources general experience, performance management and employee relations. - Good communication, presentation, negotiation skills, and problem solving skills.- Knowledge of HR process, Cambodia labor law, policy and implementation. - Sound understanding of business acumen. - English and Khmer Language Proficiency- Fully conversant with Microsoft suite of products and fully computer literate.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564

Job Description: - Responsible for Supporting and functioning of the Office of the Founder, Chairman and CEO and BoDs. - Helps manage the day-to-day tasks of OFCCEO and work in close collaboration with Secretary Team.- Assist Chief of Staff to develop any policy and SOP of OFCCEO and implement.- Assist Chief of Staff to set KPI to subordinates and monitor their works. - Work in close collaboration with Secretary Team to ensure all company’s important documents are filed properly.- Provide full administrative and secretarial support to the Founder, Chairman and CEO.- Assists in coordination the agenda of management meetings with Mr. Chairman. Make sure meeting material submitted in advance and all participants join the meeting on-time. - Taking minute of the meeting.- Attend the meeting on behalf of OFCCEO.- Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports.- Assist Chief of Staff to review documents submitted to OFCCEO.- Provide event management support as requested.- Organize Mr. Chairman’s and BoDs’s business trip.- Summary meeting minutes and reports.- Coordinate with relevant Departments and sister Companies on behalf of OFCCEO.- Ensure to fil all confidential information of company and Mr. Chairman.- Review and keep track on all financial report from Finance Department.- Performs routine review bookkeeping.- Review and check on all accounting voucher.- Prepare assets listing and depreciation schedule.- Close Month-End Accounting Record.- Quarterly Fixed Assets Confirmation.- Prepare Monthly Financial Statements.- Update fixed assets register and coding.- Monitor operation of QuickBooks and daily problem solving.- Month-end stock count all Inventories- Propose on adjustment entry and request for approval of Chief of Staff.- Create or update policy and procedures for internal control.- Team meeting and open discussion.- Responsible on monthly and year tax declaration and property tax.- Other tasks assigned by line manager and required by the company.

Make sure meeting material submitted in advance and all participants join the meeting on-time.• Taking minute of the meeting.• Attend the meeting on behalf of OFCCEO.• Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports.• Assist Chief of Staff to review documents submitted to OFCCEO.• Provide event management support as requested.• Organize Mr. Chairman’s and BoDs’s business trip.• Summary meeting minutes and reports.• Coordinate with relevant Departments and sister Companies on behalf of OFCCEO.• Ensure to fil all confidential information of company and Mr. Chairman.• Review and keep track on all financial report from Finance Department.• Performs routine review bookkeeping.• Review and check on all accounting voucher.• Prepare assets listing and depreciation schedule.• Close Month-End Accounting Record.• Quarterly Fixed Assets Confirmation.• Prepare Monthly Financial Statements.• Update fixed assets register and coding.• Monitor operation of QuickBooks and daily problem solving.• Month-end stock count all Inventories• Propose on adjustment entry and request for approval of Chief of Staff.• Create or update policy and procedures for internal control.• Team meeting and open discussion.• Responsible on monthly and year tax declaration and property tax.• Other tasks assigned by line manager and required by the company.
Job Requirement: • BA in Accounting or Business Administration• 3 to 5 years experiences in Accounting and/or Secretarial.• Accounting and QuickBooks is highly recommended.• Strong written and verbal communication skills• Good at problem solving• Enable to manage and supervise team• Working knowledge on QuickBooks and Microsoft Office (Word, Excel & PowerPoint)• Good in Office administration and time management How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

position: Executive Secretary to the Vice President for Academic Affairs

Job Description:
Key performance: 
- Lead Generation for each product/services
- Growth in overall product/services revenue
- Increase awareness & educate customers on MekongNet product & service offerings

• Responsible for all marketing programs supporting all MekongNet Services/Products (Local & International Connectivity, Data Centre & Hosting, SMS, Solutions and Products).
• As part of the Marketing team, you will work closely with various internal stakeholders including Sales, Solutions and Finance to develop and execute campaigns in accordance with company's strategic goals.
• Identify key target segments and develop lead generation programs to reach out and engage with appropriate products, services or solutions through the most appropriate communication channel or media.
• Develop and track marketing launch plans for both new and existing products/solutions, ensuring that each plan yields the desired ROI and achieve growth for Corporate Business.
• Work closely with Solutions Team to develop sales enablement materials, content or tools to ensure internal stakeholders are educated and trained on new product / solutions launches.
• Develop quality content and content calendar to engage key target audiences and stakeholders.
• Establish and own relationships with key product / solution partners for joint Go-To-Market programs.
• Conduct regular market industry research and analysis to ensure MekongNet product and services offerings are competitive in the market.
Job Requirement:
1. Education & Certification:
   • Bachelor Degree of Marketing, Business, or related field.

2. Experiences & Skills:
   • 3-5 years of experience in telecommunication field
   •Proven track record in executing product launches and lead generation programs
   • Good communications and able to drive marketing programmes independently and work well as a team player 
   • Experienced in driving both online and offline marketing campaigns, and events
   • Strong analytical skills and strong knowledge of market segmentation and market trends
   • Well-presented and attractive personality
   • Be open for travelling and field works
   • Good written and spoken English, Khmer or other languages: Chinese/Vietnamese/Thai is preferable

3. Attitude:
   • Focus and goal-orientated
   • Team player
   • Patient and can work under pressure

Job Description:
Operation:

- Ensure and drive smooth and credible sales reporting (Business health, sales volume performance, sales & distributor performance…) & Business Planning Cycle
- Liaise with IIT to use technology to transform raw data into actionable business insights
- Enforce data sanity from trade by challenging the answer to relevant data owners in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution and communicate and drive changes, if necessary, to improve data collection productivity.

Analytical:

- Manipulate & analyse complex, high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources using a variety of tools & data analysis techniques.
- Create projection models & support business owner with the development of assumptions and scenarios.
- Drive cross-functional projects using data modelling and analysis techniques to discover insights that will guide strategic decisions and uncover optimization opportunities.
- Drive to build, develop and maintain sophisticated data models, reporting systems, data visualization, dashboards and performance metrics support that support key business decisions.
- Deliver in-depth analysis on business performance (trends, funnels) and drivers, as well as forecasts & targets.
- Execute findings & identifying problem statement, develop hypothesis & build used cases to get a deep dive study.
- Build predictive model through deploying machine-learning algorithms

Communication:

- Ensure data/ analysis translate for all granular individual level across functions and level in the organization through data visualization techniques.
- Manage clear expectation with business partner and management to drive sales analytics team with clear direction and measurable success factors.
- Ensure successful completion of data insight initiatives through effective management of analyst and data employees and effective collaboration with stakeholders.

Innovation:

- Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach to improve current business practices.
- Anticipate future demands of initiatives related to people, technology, budget and business within your department and design/implement solutions to meet these needs.
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:
- At least 3-5 years of experience in a position monitoring, managing, manipulating, and drawing insights from data, and someone with experience leading a team & multiple large-scale projects.
- Preferred experiences in banking, insurance, telecom, FMCGs, Audit firm, or research – (any in business analyst fields)
- Experience in working with multiple stakeholders and managing expectation.
- Superior in interpersonal and presentation skills.
- Creative and innovative problem-solving skills
- Team oriented, collaborative, diplomatic, and flexible style, with the ability to tailor data driven results to various audience levels
- Intellectual curiosity and a passion for data and analytics
- Strong desire to take initiative; ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives
- Curious and constantly looking for new, practical ways to improve status quo and possess customer-first mindset.
- High learning agility and passionate to drive change.
- Excellent time management and demonstrate ability to multitask and prioritize
- Integrity, flexible, and innovative

Educational / minimum requirements:
- Degree in Data Analytics, Statistics, Mathematics, Accounting, Finance, Economics, or similar.
- Proficiency in using Microsoft excel & PowerPoint and knowledge of data modelling tools.
- Preferably understanding knowledge of ERP (enterprise resource planning) & DMS (distributor management system) system.
- Good Command of English both written and spoken.
- As part of your job scope, you may be required to travel to provinces or cities that may happen from time to time.

Job Description:
1.	Achieve assigned area’s secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Plan, develop, manage, control, implement and evaluate sales activities to ensure achievement of secondary sales target volumes by brand
	Provide effective leadership to a team of Field Sales and conduct field accompaniments
	Ensure effective execution of the FIT strategies to maximise sell-out/sales opportunities
	Ensure proper execution of national and localised promotions
	Provide feedback on market information to gain competitive advantage by pre-empting competitor’s moves and work with the relevant parties for counter measures
	Conduct and review business performance periodically with sales team, distributors and customers
2.	Achieve assigned distributors’ secondary sales target volumes by brand and distributor stock level
	Ensure distributors adhere to the planning cycle for placement for orders and payment on time in full to achieve the secondary sales target volumes
	Assess distributors’ implementation of the Distributors’ Management/Development Framework including periodic reviews.
	Alert Regional Sales Manager in the event of violation of fundamental principles on territory demarcation and logical route scheduling
3.	Increase distribution network via DMS entry of any Cambrew brands to meet agreed standards
	Effectively manage Cambrew and distributor sales teams according to outlet coverage plan
	Enforcement of the Distributor Demarcation plan to ensure optimal route coverage
	Periodic monitoring and assessment of distributor performance based on agreed set of objectives and targets
4.	Achieve effective spend of allocated Regional Tactical Spend (RTS) in compliance with approved guidelines and compliance
	Plan, budget and utilise the allocated RTS to ensure optimal returns based on agreed set of objectives and targets
5.	Achieve the desired image of Cambrew products in areas of Placement and Promotions
	Execute merchandising plans by ensuring adequate, selective and strategic placement of all merchandising and point-of-sales materials (POSMs)
	Ensure effective utilisation of amenities to create and increase brand awareness and visibility
6.	Achieve 100% strike rates for Perfect Serve (Freshness) targets for Cambrew products
	Ensure distributors’ aged stocks claims are within the company’s % standard against volume
	Effective implementation of stock rotation policies and first-in-first-out (FIFO) practice
7.	Develop and grow Cambrew and Distributor sales team’s efficiency and effectiveness, including brand promoters
	Coach and train using the appropriate agreed training modules
	Conduct field accompaniments, on-the-job training and leadership
8.	Develop local business and enhance corporate relation with Cambrew’s customers and trade (inclusive of trade association and common complaints)
	Increase networking by participation and supporting of trade related activities.
	Evaluate and manage any product and trade complaints and to ensure that these complaints are effectively handled and to refer to HQ for further action, if necessary
9.	Distributor conformance to Cambrew’s Commercial Policy and Legislation, and Distributorship Agreement
	Ensure periodic auditing practices are carried out properly to distributors
Job Requirement:
1.	University degree, preferably in Business Administration
2.	Preferably 3-5 years of experience in the area of Sales in FMCG industry
3.Keen analytical mind
4. Entrepreneurship skills
5. Computer knowledge (Ms. Office Applications)
6. Good command of English, written and spoken

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - Propose and review the curriculum, learning outcomes and syllabus.- Organize student testing and placement.- Be proactive in offering support to teachers in their teaching, classroom management, and assessments to students.- Support Principal, Assistant Principal in charge, Head Deputy Head ESL program in guiding newly qualified teachers in preparing lessons. - Implement and maintain academic procedures and records such as observations, teacher opinion survey, buddy system and others.- Effectively manage materials and resources as provided by AIS.- Lead, create, edit and cooperate with the examination committee of all types in accordance with the regular annual plan.- Deal with student and teacher enquiries on academic matters. - Lead and ensure the quality and effectiveness of student counseling and discipline.- Lead and carry out lesson observations and provide oral and written feedback to teachers; forward feedback documentation to the Principal in charge or Head Principal. - Work to ensure the academic and recreational aspects of the program are integrated. - Dress appropriately at all times, in line with the AIS dress code.- Monitor and track the academic processes and report it to Vice President for Academic affairs for internal audit.- Lead on preparing annual plan for academic affair and schedule for internal inspection.- Propose budget for materials, equipment and facilities and course it to the right channels to process.Management - Empower and ensure that the school committee meets the desired standards. - Maintain accurate staff records.- Assist the school committee in the set-up of the center and ensure all resources are kept properly.- Organize meetings, trainings and workshops on request. These might include an overview to the AIS academic program, current teaching methodology refreshers and develop the new program.

Job Description: - Be responsible and accountable for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with Faculty and the Aii Language Center strategic plans and direction.- Be an active member of the Faculty Executive Board and contribute to the overall leadership and management of the Faculty: it is expected that Deputy Campus Director will carry functional responsibility for specific agreed cross-cutting Faculty areas.- Develop and sustain appropriate structures for management, consultation, decision-making and communication with staff and students.- Promote and represent the center both internally and externallyResponsibility for Teaching & Students- Ensure the best possible student experience - Refresh and develop new programs in order to attract new students and markets.Responsibility for Research- Ensure the highest levels of quality, integrity and ethics in all research undertaken.- Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students.- Create and exploit new opportunities for knowledge transfer activity in order to secure additional income streams and new areas of teaching and/or research.- Contribute to the center-wide initiatives in order to improve understanding and communication of this area.- Ensure that School HR policies and procedures are implemented.- Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the Management & the Senate, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place- Ensure all staffs have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.- Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.- Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the Faculty.- Ensure students are included as appropriate in the various decisions making within the department.- Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.- Supervise & work collaboratively with the head teachers.- Take responsibility for devolved budgets and comply with the centers financial regulations.- Manage income and expenditure in order to promote financial sustainability.- Ensure adherence by all Departmental members, with the Center Financial Regulations and other financial operating procedures and regulations.- Ensure that Center’s equipment/facilities under the department´s control are properly maintained and serviced as required.- Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.- Comply with auditing, quality assurance and management procedures both internal and external development of Academic & Research- Develop and implement all short term and long term strategies and ensure consistency in same.- Assist management with accurate information as required for all campus associate activities and initiate decisions.- Determine and ensure effective maintenance on organized structure on campus.- Supervise effective working of all subordinates and provide business and managerial assistance to all and develop effective team.- Analyze all fiscal requirements for campus and execute strategies to achieve same.- Ensure adherence to all statutory and regulatory regulations.- Develop and implement various business plans on quarterly and monthly basis ensure effective working of everyday operations- Monitor all objectives and strategic goals for operations and finances and ensure achievement of same.Develop various new academic programs and provide modification to all current programs.- Administer all student recruitment.
Job Requirement: - Master degree in Education or related field- Management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.- Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).- Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.- Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.- Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.- Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.- Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.- Contribute productively to the school as a whole.- Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.- Organize learning materials and resources.- Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.- Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.- Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.- Follow and comply with teaching standards.- Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.- Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.- And other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent- Master degree is a plus- Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to employ technology- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skills.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
** Other Tasks/Daily Work

• Conduct teaching observation
• Academic, events, contests and other performances observation
• CA and Sponsorship program checking every week
• Report card checking
• Do rounds and report
• Create and maintain good communication and information sharing with teachers
• Final exam editor/updates
• New Students Interview
• Student Opinion Survey
• Monthly Report review
• Meeting parents on PTA
• Open Field Study (Coordinate with Teachers)
• Coordinating teachers’ requests (leaves, schedule, visa extension and others)
• Counseling students (mischievous, problem makers…) change shift, Promote, and Demote students
• Being a judge on students’ class project
• Being a judge on AEP major presentation
• Being an interviewer on level 1, 7, 12 and kid 12 oral interview
• Teacher and Students charity projects
• Solving all academic issues in station and other general cases within building
• Split Class, Combine Class, Cancel Class, Change Class, Swap Class
• Report, finalize, and record all related issues from teachers, students and other staff.
• Check the libraries, comment and give ideas to improve the library. Monitor the teachers using the libraries.
• Check the use of the homework log
• Check the Reading Campaign
• Check the English Speaking Environment
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor/Master degree in Education or related field
• Management experiences in education and related fields
• Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to understand and keep within a budget
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។

position: គ្រូកុំព្យូទ័រ - Computer Teacher
Job Description: ១. សមត្ថភាពបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យក)- ការងារគរុកោសល្យ  (ការបង្រៀន)- គោរពម៉ោងពេលបង្រៀនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំ- បង្កើត និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ជាប្រចាំលើបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគ្រប់កម្រិតដែលខ្លួនបង្រៀនឱ្យស្របតាមបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាគោលរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង              - អនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យទៀងទាត់ និងជាប្រចាំលើការកសាង/ អភិវឌ្ឍន៍/កែសម្រួល លើកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ/ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍- ផលិត និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវសម្ភារឧបទេស (ការបង្កើតដោយផ្ទាល់ដៃ ឬការ ទិញស្រាប់) ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងខ្លឹមសារមេរៀនឱ្យមានលក្ខណៈសម្បូរបែបក្នុងដំណើរការបង្រៀនសិស្ស- អនុវត្តន៍វិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនតាមគោលវិធី “សិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌល”  - បង្រៀនទ្រឹសី្តតិច ហើយនាំសិស្សចូលបន្ទប់អនុវត្តន៍កុំព្យូទ័រឱ្យបានច្រើន- រៀបចំបង្កើតកម្រងសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស គន្លឹះ និងច្បាស់លាស់លើ ទម្ងន់ ប្រភេទនៃសំណួរ និងទម្រង់បែបបទនៃ វិញ្ញាសា- អនុវត្តន៍ការវាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស តាមរយៈគោលការណ៍៥០% លើសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ (កិច្ចការផ្ទះ ឬការ ស្រាវជ្រាវ២០%  សំណួរQUIZ ឬសំណួរផ្ទាល់មាត់ ឬពិនិត្យសៀវភៅ១០%  វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌១០% សកម្មភាពក្នុងថ្នាក់៥%  អវត្តមាន៥%)  និង៥០% លើការប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ  ប្រកបដោយភាពហ្មត់ចត់ តឹងរ៉ឹង និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ កម្រិតខ្ពស់បំផុត ធានាឱ្យបាននូវតម្លាភាព និង គុណភាពលើសមត្ថភាពពិតប្រាកដរបស់សិស្ស- តាមដានលើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស លើកទឹកចិត្ត  និងរិះរកគ្រប់មធ្យោបាយ     លើបច្ចេកទេសបង្រៀន ដើម្បីជួយដល់សិស្សដែលរៀនខ្សោយក្នុងថ្នាក់- សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្រៀន និងបង្កើតនូវវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារខ)- កិច្ចការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យសិស្សលើឯកសណ្ឋាន កាតសិស្ស សក់ ក្រចកដៃ ផាត់មុខ និងវត្តមានសិស្សជាប្រចាំ រៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអនាម័យ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន និងតុកៅអីក្នុងថ្នាក់ (គ្មានការគូសវាស) ជាប្រចាំរៀងរាល់ម៉ោងបង្រៀន- ចូលរួមសន្សំសំចៃទឹកភ្លើង និងការប្រើប្រាស់វាំងននក្នុងម៉ោងបង្រៀន បទបែនតាមស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែង- ចូលរួម និងសហការការងារសិក្សាធិការរបស់សិស្សជាមួយការិយាល័យសិក្សា អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសាលា ចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក តាមនីតិវិធីការងារ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងដែលមានចែង- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកគ)- ប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យ- ចូលរួមប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេស ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ឬប្រចាំខែ តាមក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស របស់ខ្លួនឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងគោរពតាមនីតិវិធីការងារ ឬ/និង គោលការណ៍នៃការប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស- ចែករំលែកបទពិសោធន៍ សមត្ថភាព ផ្លាស់ប្តូរយោបល់ បង្ហាញហេតុផល/ ការយល់ឃើញ យ៉ាងសកម្មក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌពិភាក្សាដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍ គរុកោសល្យ។- មានរបាយការណ៍ និងកំណត់ហេតុប្រជុំបច្ចេកទេសត្រឹមត្រូវ និងរក្សាទុកក្នុង សៀវភៅរដ្ឋបាលគ្រូ២. ការអប់រំសីលធម៌- ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស- នៅឱ្យកៀកជាមួយនឹងសិស្ស ដើម្បីក្តាប់យកព័ត៌មាន ក៏ដូចជា ស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែងរបស់សិស្ស ព្រមទាំងបញ្ជូននូវព័ត៌មានទាំងឡាយណា ដែលជាបញ្ហាទៅកាន់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ  និងជំនួយឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា- ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ- ផ្តល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយនូវតម្លៃ និងសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្ស ដើម្បីឱ្យពួកគេអាច បញ្ចូលខ្លួន និងអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួននៅក្នុងសង្គម៣. ការងាររដ្ឋបាល គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ ចងក្រង រក្សាទុក (Soft Coppy or/and Hard Coppy) លើវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស សម្ភារឧបទេស និងសម្ភារសិក្សា កិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងមេរៀនសង្ខេបបំណែងចែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ស្នាដៃសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវនានា (រួមទាំងសិស្ស ឬគ្រូខ្លួនឯង និងក្រុមបច្ចេកទេស)- ចូលរួមជាគណៈកម្មការប្រឡង  គណៈមេប្រយោគ  អនុរក្ស តាមការតែងតាំង/ ចាត់តាំងពីចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែឱ្យចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកផ្ទាល់អំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ បំណែងចែក កម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬដំណើរការនៃការបង្រៀន លទ្ធផលសិក្សា របស់សិស្ស (លទ្ធផលវិជ្ជាមាន និងចំណុចដែលត្រូវអភិវឌ្ឍ) តាមខែនីមួយ- បញ្ចូលពិន្ទុប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាសក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធពិន្ទុ (DATA BASE) និងផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ពិន្ទុជូនផ្នែកលេខាធិការតាម កាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលសាលាបានកំណត់។- ប្រតិបត្តិនូវការងារផ្សេងៗដែលកំណត់ដោយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក
Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្រៀន Microsoft Office and Design - មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនជាក់ស្តែងពីរ(០២)ឆ្នាំយ៉ាងតិច- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស…)- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និងទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតូចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។- មានគំនិតផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍសមត្ថភាពគរុកោសល្យរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
1. Scope of working

Senior Database Administrator is responsible for managing and maintaining a company’s database system, ensuring that the database systems are designed, installed, and maintained to meet the company business and technical requirements.

2.Duties & responsibilities:

•	Monitoring system performance and identifying problems that arise.
•	Responding in a timely manner to user-reported errors.
•	Protecting the database against threats or unauthorized access.
•	Ensuring that the database is adequately backed up and able to be recovered in the event of memory loss.
•	Reporting on metrics regarding usage and performance.
•	Suggesting changes and improvements for database maintenance or protection.
•	Regularly liaising with programmers and database programmers.
•	Designing databases with both front-end and back-end users in mind.
•	Establishing end-user database access control levels.
•	Ensuring database access and integrity.
•	Monitoring and optimizing the database's performance by planning for the database system's memory, disk space, and network requirements.
•	Planning for backup and recovery of database information and conducting regular tests regularly to ensure usability.
•	Backing up and restoring databases.
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & Requirement

•	A bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field.
•	Advanced certification as an MCDBA or MCSD for .NET is advantageous.
•	A minimum of 3 years' experience as a database administrator.
•	Proficiency in data manipulation languages, including MS SQL and MySQL
•	Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills.
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
•	Highly organized and responsible.
•	Capable of working under pressure.
•	Up to date with trends and developments in database administration.

•	Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm
